item.title: Contact
item.description: Contact Details Note: This is the best way to reach me. Reach-ability lowers from top to bottom. For example, Signal and Matrix are the fastest ways to reach me, while Telegram is the slowest way. My Contact Info Service Details Signal +44 7459 945702 Matrix @james:james-clarke.ynh.fr XMPP james@james-clarke.ynh.fr Email james@james-clarke.ynh.fr Tox James Clarke Briar James Clarke Telegram +44 7962 665125 Note: Please note these telephone numbers do not work with SMS/Calling, so you have to use them for Signal/Telegram, respectively.
